# Contributing to Claude Plugin Ecosystem Hub

First off, thank you for considering contributing to the Claude Plugin Ecosystem Hub! üéâ

This repository is a community-driven effort to catalog and organize the ever-growing Claude ecosystem. Every contribution, no matter how small, helps the entire Claude community.

## üìã Table of Contents

- [Code of Conduct](#code-of-conduct)
- [How Can I Contribute?](#how-can-i-contribute)

## Code of Conduct

By participating in this project, you agree to abide by our Code of Conduct:

- **Be Respectful**: Treat everyone with respect and kindness
- **Be Constructive**: Provide helpful feedback and suggestions
- **Be Inclusive**: Welcome newcomers and help them get started
- **Be Professional**: Keep discussions focused and productive

## How Can I Contribute?

### üîó Add New Resources

**Adding a Marketplace:**
1. Verify the marketplace is active and legitimate
2. Add to the appropriate section in README.md
3. Include: Name, URL, Description, Plugin count, Last verified date

**Adding an MCP Server:**
1. Ensure it's not already listed
2. Add to the MCP section with proper categorization
3. Include: Repository link, Stars (if GitHub), Description

**Adding Skills/Commands:**
1. Verify functionality
2. Place in correct category
3. Provide clear description

### üêõ Fix Issues

**Broken Links:**
1. Check if resource moved or was deleted
2. Update link or remove entry
3. Note the change in PR description

**Outdated Information:**
1. Verify current status
2. Update counts, descriptions, or status
3. Update "Last Verified" date

### üìù Improve Documentation

- Fix typos and grammar
- Clarify confusing sections
- Add missing information
- Translate to other languages

### üí° Suggest Enhancements

- New categories or sections
- Better organization methods
- Automation improvements
- Visual enhancements

## Submission Guidelines

### Format Requirements

#### For Marketplaces:
```markdown
| [**Marketplace Name**](https://url.com) | üèÜ Brief description | 100+ plugins | ‚úÖ Active | Nov 2024 |
```

#### For GitHub Repos:
```markdown
| [**repo-name**](https://github.com/user/repo) | [@username](https://github.com/username) | üéØ Description | Count/Type | Nov 2024 |
```

#### For MCP Servers:
```markdown
| [**server-name**](https://github.com/user/mcp-server) | ‚≠ê 1.2k+ | üîß Purpose | Brief description |
```

### Content Guidelines

‚úÖ **DO:**
- Use clear, concise descriptions
- Include accurate counts/metrics
- Add verification dates
- Use appropriate emoji icons
- Maintain alphabetical order within sections
- Test all links before submitting

‚ùå **DON'T:**
- Submit duplicate entries
- Add promotional/marketing language
- Include broken or suspicious links
- Make unverified claims
- Add personal opinions

## Quality Standards

### Link Verification
- All links must be working and accessible
- No URL shorteners
- Prefer HTTPS over HTTP
- No tracking parameters

### Description Quality
- 5-10 words maximum
- Focus on functionality
- Avoid marketing speak
- Be objective

### Metrics Accuracy
- Verify plugin/server counts
- Use "100+" format for estimates
- Update star counts if significantly changed
- Include date of verification

## Pull Request Process

### 1. Fork & Clone
```bash
git fork https://github.com/umitkacar/claude-plugin-ecosystem-hub
git clone https://github.com/YOUR-USERNAME/claude-plugin-ecosystem-hub
cd claude-plugin-ecosystem-hub
```

### 2. Create Branch
```bash
git checkout -b add-marketplace-name
# or
git checkout -b fix-broken-links
# or
git checkout -b update-plugin-counts
```

### 3. Make Changes
- Edit files as needed
- Follow formatting guidelines
- Test your changes locally

### 4. Commit
```bash
git add .
git commit -m "feat: Add XYZ marketplace with 150+ plugins"
# or
git commit -m "fix: Update broken link for ABC plugin"
# or
git commit -m "docs: Improve installation instructions"
```

Use conventional commits:
- `feat:` New feature/resource
- `fix:` Bug fix or correction
- `docs:` Documentation changes
- `chore:` Maintenance tasks

### 5. Push & PR
```bash
git push origin your-branch-name
```

Then create a Pull Request with:
- Clear title describing the change
- List of modifications in description
- Any relevant context or screenshots
- Confirmation that links were tested

### 6. Review Process
- Maintainers will review within 48 hours
- Address any feedback promptly
- Once approved, changes will be merged

## Recognition

### Contributors List
All contributors are automatically added to our Contributors section with:
- Profile picture and link
- Contribution badges
- Recognition in release notes

### Special Recognition
- **10+ contributions**: Special contributor badge
- **25+ contributions**: Core contributor status
- **50+ contributions**: Maintainer consideration

### Monthly Highlights
We feature top contributors in our:
- Monthly changelog
- Social media posts
- Community newsletter

## Questions?

- **GitHub Issues**: For bugs and feature requests
- **GitHub Discussions**: For questions and ideas
- **Email**: [Contact maintainers](mailto:umitkacar@example.com)
